title: Alex McKenna & A Winter's Night
description: For a minute, everything in Alex McKenna’s life was perfect. He only had one year left of high school, his girlfriend Margaret was the love of his life, and he couldn’t ask for a more supportive family.His psychic powers were growing and he we was learning more and more about his family’s ability as Strega witches. Yup…things were good.Until the night it all fell to pieces. As Margaret lay in the hospital after a serious car accident, her disembodied spirit searches for a way back to the living. Alex is desperate to save her and the victims of his next case: an ominous being haunting the hospital and stealing the souls of infants and the elderly, sending them straight to Hell.
author: Vicki-Ann Bush
